snippet: The F.E.C. ended another abysmal year with its three Republican commissioners blocking an attempt to unmask secret donors.
abstract: Editorial scores the three Republican commissioners of the Federal Election Commission for blocking an attempt to unmask the secret donors flooding the 2012 elections with unlimited special-interest money.
lead_paragraph: The F.E.C. ended another abysmal year with its three Republican commissioners blocking an attempt to unmask secret donors.

keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)
keywords.name: subject
